attributes.action: Why are we Going back to 40yrs ago
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i think we should have a Pony & Trap.
No More Speading Fines, No Speed camera's Needed
Brilliant for the Garden, no more buying Veg, from Supermarkets @ High Prices.
The Goverment, dont worry, they claim expenses, for FUEL

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
